name: Mantle Network
intro: A high performance Ethereum layer-2 network with modular design
introduce: Mantle is a high-performance Ethereum layer-2 network built with modular architecture delivering low fees and high security. Builders can leverage Mantle’s unique design to build dApps with exceptional UX, all while relying on Ethereum’s unrivaled security.  Mantle is a product of BitDAO, and is governed by the $BIT community.
